name: Hands of Justice
description:
In the future, currupted politicians are not tolerated and are replaced by robots.

Thus ultimately the computers control the society.

The player has to "discard" all corrupted politicians and replace them with robots. There is a race against the time, since they are stealing from the state treasury and with increasing levels there is increasing amount of politicians.

At the end it's better to strategize to select and discard the most stealing ones first so you don't run out of money.

Uses HTC Vive virtual reality headset.
